content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":126031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、ノワール達にも特別に許しは得た」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I've also gotten special permission from Noir and the others.\""},{"lineNumber":126032,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今から丸二日間は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From now on, for a full two days,"},{"lineNumber":126033,"originalJapaneseLine":"　梵天丸は我のものよな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Bontenmaru will be mine...\""},{"lineNumber":126034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see.\""},{"lineNumber":126035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただし、丸二日間、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, for these full two days,"},{"lineNumber":126036,"originalJapaneseLine":"　色々な優先権を手放すこととなったが」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've had to give up various priorities.\""},{"lineNumber":126037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうしても、今日必要だったのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Was it absolutely necessary to have it today?\""},{"lineNumber":126038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes...\""},{"lineNumber":126039,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日は離れとうない……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't want to be apart today..."},{"lineNumber":126040,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうしても」","translatedEnglishLine":"No matter what.\""},{"lineNumber":126041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういう気分じゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's the kind of mood I'm in.\""},{"lineNumber":126042,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういう気分か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":126043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right.\""},{"lineNumber":126044,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なら仕方ないな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then it can't be helped.\""},{"lineNumber":126045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":126046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「梵天丸……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bontenmaru...\""},{"lineNumber":126047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":126048,"originalJapaneseLine":"「梵天丸、梵天丸、梵天丸」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bontenmaru, Bontenmaru, Bontenmaru.\""},{"lineNumber":126049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここにいるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm here.\""},{"lineNumber":126050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah!\""},{"lineNumber":126051,"originalJapaneseLine":"更に力強く、お町が政宗を抱きしめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Even more powerfully, Omachi embraces Masamune."},{"lineNumber":126052,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こうしておるだけで……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just like this..."},{"lineNumber":126053,"originalJapaneseLine":"　身も……心まで溶けるようじゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"My body... even my heart feels like it’s melting...\""},{"lineNumber":126054,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so...?"},{"lineNumber":126055,"originalJapaneseLine":"　溶けるなよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't melt away.\""},{"lineNumber":126056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうよな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right..."},{"lineNumber":126057,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当に溶けてしまえば……","translatedEnglishLine":"If you really melt away..."},{"lineNumber":126058,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こうして抱きしめることも出来ん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then I wouldn’t be able to hold you like this...\""},{"lineNumber":126059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah.\""},{"lineNumber":126060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが……今日は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... today..."},{"lineNumber":126061,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前とこのまま溶けおうてしまいたい気分じゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel like melting away with you just like this.\""},{"lineNumber":126062,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":126063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then..."},{"lineNumber":126064,"originalJapaneseLine":"　満足するまで付き合おう」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll stay with you until you're satisfied.\""},{"lineNumber":126065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、付きおうておくれ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, please keep me company...\""},{"lineNumber":126066,"originalJapaneseLine":"長い、長い時間が流れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"A long, long time passes."},{"lineNumber":126067,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nn...\""},

{"lineNumber":126068,"originalJapaneseLine":"脱いだわけでもないのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"Without even taking them off,"},

{"lineNumber":126069,"originalJapaneseLine":"いつしか服は着崩れ、ずり落ち、","translatedEnglishLine":"before they knew it, their clothes became disheveled and slipped off,"},

{"lineNumber":126070,"originalJapaneseLine":"両者は裸となっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and both were naked."},

{"lineNumber":126071,"originalJapaneseLine":"お互いの熱を分け合いやすくするように。","translatedEnglishLine":"As if to share each other's warmth more easily."},

{"lineNumber":126072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はむ……ちゅっちゅっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hamu... chu chu...\" (sounds of kissing)"},

{"lineNumber":126073,"originalJapaneseLine":"お町は先程から何度も何度も","translatedEnglishLine":"Omachi had been, over and over again,"},

{"lineNumber":126074,"originalJapaneseLine":"政宗の頭に手に頬（？）にと","translatedEnglishLine":"kissing Masamune’s head, hands, cheeks(?) and various places."},

{"lineNumber":126075,"originalJapaneseLine":"至るところに口づけをしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"She had been placing kisses everywhere."},

{"lineNumber":126076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey.\""},{"lineNumber":126077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":126078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いかほどの時間が流れた？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How much time has passed?\""},{"lineNumber":126079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こうしてから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since doing this..."},{"lineNumber":126080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二時間というところかのう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I guess about two hours...\""},{"lineNumber":126081,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んっ……時間など気にするな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nn... don’t worry about time..."},{"lineNumber":126082,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このまま、我と……このまま……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Stay like this with me... just like this...\""},{"lineNumber":126083,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、すまない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I’m sorry.\""},{"lineNumber":126084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":126085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とても、な……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It was a very...\""},{"lineNumber":126086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah.\""},{"lineNumber":126087,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とても恐ろしい夢を見た……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I had a very terrifying dream...\""},{"lineNumber":126088,"originalJapaneseLine":"「梵天丸、お前がいなくなる夢じゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A dream where you, Bontenmaru, disappeared...\""},{"lineNumber":126089,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おらんのだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You were gone...\""},{"lineNumber":126090,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこを捜しても……どこにもお前が……","translatedEnglishLine":"No matter where I looked... you were nowhere to be found...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、ノワール達にも特別に許しは得た」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I've also gotten special permission from Noir and the others."
"From now on, for a full two days,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 梵天丸は我のものよな……」
色々な優先権を手放すこととなったが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've had to give up various priorities."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうしても、今日必要だったのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Was it absolutely necessary to have it today?"
"I don't want to be apart today...
"That's the kind of mood I'm in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に力強く、お町が政宗を抱きしめる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even more powerfully, Omachi embraces Masamune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身も……心まで溶けるようじゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My body... even my heart feels like it’s melting..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に溶けてしまえば……
こうして抱きしめることも出来ん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I wouldn’t be able to hold you like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前とこのまま溶けおうてしまいたい気分じゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like melting away with you just like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満足するまで付き合おう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll stay with you until you're satisfied."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い、長い時間が流れる。
脱いだわけでもないのに、
いつしか服は着崩れ、ずり落ち、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: before they knew it, their clothes became disheveled and slipped off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両者は裸となっていた。
お互いの熱を分け合いやすくするように。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if to share each other's warmth more easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お町は先程から何度も何度も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Omachi had been, over and over again,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗の頭に手に頬（？）にと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: kissing Masamune’s head, hands, cheeks(?) and various places.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 至るところに口づけをしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She had been placing kisses everywhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二時間というところかのう……」
このまま、我と……このまま……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stay like this with me... just like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「梵天丸、お前がいなくなる夢じゃ……」
どこを捜しても……どこにもお前が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter where I looked... you were nowhere to be found..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、ノワール達にも特別に許しは得た」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I've also gotten special permission from Noir and the others."
"From now on, for a full two days,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 梵天丸は我のものよな……」
色々な優先権を手放すこととなったが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've had to give up various priorities."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうしても、今日必要だったのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Was it absolutely necessary to have it today?"
"I don't want to be apart today...
"That's the kind of mood I'm in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に力強く、お町が政宗を抱きしめる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even more powerfully, Omachi embraces Masamune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身も……心まで溶けるようじゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My body... even my heart feels like it’s melting..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に溶けてしまえば……
こうして抱きしめることも出来ん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I wouldn’t be able to hold you like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前とこのまま溶けおうてしまいたい気分じゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like melting away with you just like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満足するまで付き合おう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll stay with you until you're satisfied."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い、長い時間が流れる。
脱いだわけでもないのに、
いつしか服は着崩れ、ずり落ち、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: before they knew it, their clothes became disheveled and slipped off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両者は裸となっていた。
お互いの熱を分け合いやすくするように。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if to share each other's warmth more easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お町は先程から何度も何度も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Omachi had been, over and over again,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗の頭に手に頬（？）にと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: kissing Masamune’s head, hands, cheeks(?) and various places.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 至るところに口づけをしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She had been placing kisses everywhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二時間というところかのう……」
このまま、我と……このまま……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stay like this with me... just like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「梵天丸、お前がいなくなる夢じゃ……」
どこを捜しても……どこにもお前が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter where I looked... you were nowhere to be found..."
